Detailed Description

Exposes methods for querying Deviare database object properties.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktDbObject::Align ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the alignment in bytes of the database object.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the alignment in bytes.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::ArrayMaxHint ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get a hint of the maximum array index allowed for an array database object.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the value.
Remarks
Zero indicates either the object is not an array; or the maximum index equals to ULONG_MAX constant.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::Class ( [out, retval] eNktDboClass *  pVal)
get

Get the class of the database object.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive eNktDboClass enumerator value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::DbModules ( [out, retval] INktDbModulesEnum **  ppDbModsEnum)

Retrieves a database modules enumerator object of this database object.

Parameters
[in,out]ppDbModsEnumA pointer to receive the enumerator interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::Declaration ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the declaration of the database object.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to string to receive the declaration.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if insufficient string buffer was provided.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::Evaluate ( [out, retval] INktDbObject **  ppDbObject)

Dereference a pointer-type object and returns the pointed database object.

Parameters
[in,out]ppDbObjectPointer to address to receive the dereferenced object.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL if general error or this parameter is not of pointer-type.
HRESULT INktDbObject::Flags ( [out, retval] LONG *  pVal)
get

Get the flags of a struct, union or function database object.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the set of flags, if this object is struct, union or function typed.
See also
eNktDboStructUnionFlags and eNktDboFunctionFlags enumerations.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::FullEvaluate ( [out, retval] INktDbObject **  ppDbObject)

Recursively dereference this pointer object.

Parameters
[in,out]ppDbObjectPointer to address to receive the dereferenced object interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if ppDbObject is NULL.
E_FAIL if general error, or this object is not pointer-typed.
HRESULT INktDbObject::FuncCallingConvention ( [out, retval] eNktDboCallingConvention *  pVal)
get

Get the calling convention of a function database object.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to eNktDboCallingConvention enumerator to receive.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::FunctionReturn ( [out, retval] INktDbObject **  ppDbObject)
get

Get the return object a function database object.

Parameters
[in,out]ppDbObjectA pointer to receive the database object.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::FunctionReturnDeclaration ( [out, retval] BSTR *  pVal)
get

Get the return declaration a function database object.

Parameters
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the return declaration string.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer is insufficient.
E_FAIL on general error.

HRESULT INktDbObject::IndexedEvaluate ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] INktDbObject **  ppDbObject 
)

Dereference the pointer stored at specified index if the object is an array.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]ppDbObjectPointer to address to receive the dereferenced object interface.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_INVALIDARG if specified index is invalid.
E_POINTER if ppDbObject is NULL.
E_FAIL if general error, this object is not an array, or the stored array value cannot be dereferenced.
HRESULT INktDbObject::IsAnsiString ( [out, retval] VARIANT_BOOL *  pVal)
get

Check if this parameter can be treated as an ANSI string.

Parameters
[in,out]pValPointer to receive boolean value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::IsArray ( [out, retval] VARIANT_BOOL *  pVal)
get

Check if the database object is an array.

Parameters
[in,out]pValTRUE if the object is an array.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.

Returns

HRESULT INktDbObject::Item ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] INktDbObject **  ppDbObj 
)

Get the child item at index.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]ppDbObjPointer to receive the object interface, if any.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if no item was found at specified index.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktDbObject::ItemDeclaration ( [in] LONG  index,
[out, retval] BSTR *  pVal 
)

Get the declaration of the item.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]pValPointer to string to receive the item declaration.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer is insufficient.
E_INVALIDARG if no item was found at specified index.
E_FAIL on general error.

[out, retval] LONG *  pVal 
)

Get the flags of the item.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]pValPointer to receive the item flags. See eNktDboItemFlags enumeration members.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if no item was found at specified index.
E_FAIL on general error.

Parameters
indexZero-based index.
[in,out]pValIf non-null, the value.
Returns
S_OK on success.

HRESULT INktDbObject::NameToIndex ( [in] BSTR  name,
[out, retval] LONG *  pVal 
)

Find the zero-based index of a named child item.

Parameters
nameThe name to search for.
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the zero-based index.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if no child was found with the specified name.
E_FAIL on general error.

Returns
S_OK on success.
